body:
Ned: Its gonna work for sure Peter! It worked on Betty.

Peter: I dont think its gonna work on MJ. It sounds stupid!

Ned: C'mon man! All you have to do is go to her, put your hand on her shoulder and say “Ar-

***

Random dude comes up to MJ: ” Are you from heaven?“

MJ *deapans*: That’s right. I’m a ghost. I died 15 years ago, kinda like that pick up line.

***

Peter:…please tell me that wasn’t what you were telling me to do

Ned:….

Peter: I’m screwed.

***

MJ walks up to Peter: Parker..meet me at the coffee house at 8

Peter: uumm…f-for what?

MJ *rolls eyes*: For a date Parker. Thought you were a genius.

Peter: ohh..okay. see you then

***

Ned: She honestly scares me

Peter: *heart eyes*

blog.title: ‘ WE WON MR STARK ’

body:
IM DOWN

requested by anonymous: College! Peter and reader meeting through a blind date please ☺️ Congrats on your milestone

-

your friend knew that you were never one for dating, especially blind dating. you believed that the right people would come into your life at the right time. but after some persisting from you friend saying that she had found to perfect guy for you, you reluctantly agreed. and that’s how you ended up sat in a small restaurant near campus. it was only small, but the look of it alone was nice enough to tell you that you’d want to go back there again. it was cute, and honestly a perfect setting for a first blind date.

you weren’t there long, considering that you had opted to get there ten minutes early so you weren’t late. he walked in after about five minutes, a nervous smile on his face as he made his way over to your table. you could tell this was his first blind date too, and it took a certain anxiousness of your chest at the thought of not being the only one out of your element. “y/n, right?” he asked, his voice wavering a bit after your name. you smiled with a nod in reply,

“i’ll let you in on a secret, this is my first blind date too.” you see his shoulders visibly relax at his words. “i’m guessing y/f/n kinda forced you into this too?” you ask with a slight smile,

“yeah, they did.” he nods, but his face changes and he looks down at the table for a moment. “i’m uh, glad she did though. you’re really pretty.” he stutters out, and you feel your face heat up at the compliment.

“thank you, you’re not so bad yourself.” you reply teasingly, and the rest of the night is filled with conversation and small awkward smiles from the two of you. you are glad your friend set you up wit him, because not only was he extremely cute but also had a likable personality, you feel like you could hear him talk for hours. “i really enjoyed tonight.” 

“me too, definitely.” peter replied as the two of you walked out of the restaurant. your dorm mate was supposed to be picking you up from outside. “and i’d really like to do it again. you know, if you’re down.”

“i’m down.” peter smiled brightly at your reply, deciding to wait outside with you before your ride arrived. although you didn’t date a lot, you saw the kind of guys your friends would date and you knew they weren’t the best kind of people. but peter was considerate, he thought about people other them himself. and that’s something you could really admire about someone. so it was easy to say you were excited for your next day and hopefully the ones that come after it.

-

i’m so sorry that this took so long, i’ve been in a major writers block and i just couldn’t put my ideas into words. i know this isn’t the best but it’s the best i have been able to come up with xx

@taojiiih @snowxbarryxendgame @ladybugmakestea @parkerindustrys @aussie-holland @gmzparkr

summary: Being bombarded by school projects and exams and being so stressed out that you can't study and Peter helping you with some self...
question: Being bombarded by school projects and exams and being so stressed out that you can't study and Peter helping you with some self care because you refuse to give yourself a break?
answer:
You’ve been studying almost nonstop for days, dodging calls and texts from Peter, only answering him with “sorry, studying” and leaving it at that. He gets it and you know that so it didn’t bother you much or even him. What actually bothered Peter was that you were running yourself to the ground with studying and projects. Sure, there are deadlines and the projects are big on your grade, but running yourself to the ground isn’t going to get you to pass and it’s not healthy. So, Peter comes by completely unannounced one day to make you take a break.

“Peter?” You raise a brow as you open the door. “I told you–”

“Studying.” Peter cuts you off with a close-lipped smile. “But, uh, you need a break. Can I come in?” He asks, eyes innocent and doe-like as he holds up his backpack.

You let out a sigh and let him in. He came all the way over to you so you might as well let him in. Besides, you know he’s only here because he cares and maybe you can convince him to help you study rather than take a break.

“We’re not studying.” Peter says as he reaches the couch.

Or not.

“But–”

“I brought snacks,” Peter opens his backpack and pulls out some of your favorites. “And I-,uh, I went to that shop you like, the one you took me to once? Ya know? And got the mask you like.”

You walk up to him and take the little container from him. “You know which one I use?”

“It looks right and smells the same. Is it right?” Peter’s eyes are wide and brows raised, almost worried he got the wrong one.

“No, no, it’s right.” You shake your head but can’t help but smile. “But, I do need to study.”

“You’ve been studying for days. You need a break otherwise it’ll be for nothing. So,” Peter plucks the container from your hand. “We’ll do this and watch whatever you want with the snacks.”

He’s persistent and you know he’s not going to bother giving up. And you don’t really want him to. Exams and projects are important but he’s right, you’re not going to pass anything if you don’t take a break. What better break than one with Peter?

“Let me put my things away.” You sigh and move to the table but Peter stops you.

“I’ll do, get comfortable.” Peter starts packing up your belongings before you have time to protest, knowing that he’ll remove all looks of studying and the day will only be spent focused on each other and whatever you decide to watch.

So, Peter comes by completely unannounced one day to make you take a break.

He gets it and you know that so it didn’t bother you much or even him. What actually bothered Peter was that you were running yourself to the ground with studying and projects. Sure, there are deadlines and the projects are big on your grade, but running yourself to the ground isn’t going to get you to pass and it’s not healthy. So, Peter comes by completely unannounced one day to make you take a break.

body:
Diaries of a Serial Killer.

Diaries of a Serial Killer.

Chapter 3

Sometime 1999

I hate feeling the way i do, i hate this unbearable guilt inside of me for the things that i’ve done. I hate knowing that someone out there is searching for the boys i let dissapear. The feeling of a crying family who try so hard to hold onto that hope that their boy is still alive, which hes not, i felt his light fade away right in my own two hands. When did i become this ? Why do i keep hurting people that i actually wanna be with???

I hate myself so much that i force myself to be confident at all times, that is the reason why i always appear like a major jerk to everyone. Because if i dont pretend..even for a second someone could see the real me, could lurk behind this strong mask of mine and reveal the broken psychopathic killer that i am. I want to stop i want to focus on good things i need to do good things for a Balance, for change.

Is there a study that Psychopaths are even able to cry? Or am i just tripping again ?. What is this nightmare that i can’t escape out of, why do i need this to function ? And why is nobody asking question ? Nobody is suspecting me and im just slowly losing my mind.

I need to quit doing coke at 3am.

Anthony Edward “Tony” Stark .

After Tony hit Peter over the head with a heavy book he dragged him into the elevator and took him into the basement. Its quiet down there, the walls are thick and only Tony has Access to it which makes it the Perfect spot. He lays the boy down onto a matress and cuffs his hand to the stone wall, its a special Kind of material he wont be able to break out of that.

Tony then sits down outside of the huge Metall cage on a chair, feeling some tears behind his eyes again. For so long he was able to stop, he did good he helped people to get his so deeply needed Balance back, and here he is, having a full on relapse. For so long he was able to resist. To fight this dark urge inside of him and all it took was Peter asking in that weak voice of his if Tony is going to kill him to send him over that edge again.

So he lets a tear slip out, wiping it away just as quickly and leaning back, head against the wall and waiting for Peter to wake up. Meanwhile he pulls out a small list of his rules that Peter is going to need if he wants to survive this, because this time Tony isnt going to have fun and then kill him.

Hes going to try to convert the boy, to bring him onto his dark path to Twist and turn him, someone needs to carry on Tonys legacy afterall.

Its going to be a Lot of work tho he already knows it.

Just After that Peter jumps awake, standing up and turning to look at Tony. “What did you do? Why…why did you..ouch” Peter frowns, moving his other hand to gently stroke over the bump on his head. Thats when he remembers what he read what he found out about Tony, and it sends a dark shiver down his spine when he looks around.

His expression changing .

“I… I thought you liked me Mr. Stark i thought we were something like friends. Please don’t do this we can talk about everything you know i listen! Just Please…let me…go” And then his voice cracks he starts crying, not heavily just a bit, he tries to keep it down he dosent want to upset the Killer infront of him afterall. “I thought…. Nevermind.” Peter says.

When Tony sees that boys eyes tearing up he feels that guilt in his chest again, staring back at him. The last sentence spiked his interest. “You thought what ? Come on, Peter just spit it out i have work to do and all that i can’t sit around here and Listen to..-” thats when hes being cut off by Peter .

“I thought…I really thought you were crushing on me too…” he frowns deeply. Despite their situation and all, but this hurt him deeply. He really thought Tony liked him ‘in that way’ and now hes here, in a cage, being chained to a wall. “Just don’t go… please don’t leave me alone down here i am..im.. kinda scared of the dark” Peter admits, a tear Rolling down his cheek.

And Tony, well Tony feels his guilt get heavier with every word.

What has he done?

to be continued…

( tag list: @lovehonestlyvaliantbouquetus )

blog.description: Just mainly incorrect Marvel quotes, Marvel headcannons, art and such

summary:
The Iron-Family at Disneyland: Getting Ready and On their Way
Peter had been relentless. He had always wanted to go to Disney,...
body:
The Iron-Family at Disneyland: Getting Ready and On their Way

Peter had been relentless. He had always wanted to go to Disney, and so did Harley, Nebula and Vision. Tony and Pepper had taken Morgan there once, but she was too little to remember it.

“Ok, does everyone have their bags?” Tony said.

They all shook their heads yes. Peter had a Spiderman backpack he saw at Target, Harley had a red and black bag, Nebula had a silky blue bag, Vision had a normal backpack, and Tony held Morgans Iron Man backpack with a Hello Kitty key chain.

“Ok. Does everyone have sunscreen, money for food and stuff, and their phones, because we are not turning around.” Tony asked.

They all checked and said yes.

“Ok, let’s load up!” Tony motioned his hand towards the door. Peter and Harley took off running, while Nebula and Vision just walked. Tony said bye to Pepper and gave her a kiss, and Morgan hugged her. Morgan then went to run with Peter and Harley but Tony picked her up and carried her piggy-back style.

They all arrived at the car. Vision was in the front with Tony and helped navigate, Nebula and Morgan were in the next row, and Peter and Harley sat in the back.

The car was a war zone.

Peter dropped his phone and it slid up and infront of Nebula. Nebula had air pods from Tony on, and couldn’t hear Peter, and Morgan fell asleep.

“Oh no. She can’t hear us. She has air pods!” Harley joked, witch did not amuse Peter.

Peter webbed his mouth shut. He went to get unbuckled but Tony threatened to take away his suit if he did. Peter then asked Vision to get his phone, but he was too busy with helping Tony with directions.

Finally after about five minutes of bugging him, Vision unbuckled, got his phone and gave it to Peter. Meanwhile Tony took a wrong turn and was yelling at Vision, who blamed Peter. Harley got the webbing off with one of Nebula’s knives he found on the floor and was yelling at Peter. Morgan woke up and was grumpy, while Nebula still heard nothing.

About an hour later they arrived at the airport. Rhodey would come later and pick up Tony’s car.

After a long wait they boarded their plane. Harley was a little scared, so Tony sat beside him. Vision sat behind Tony with Morgan, and Peter and Nebula were infront of Tony and Harley.

The flight was much better than the car. Everyone fell asleep, except for Vision.

When the plane landed, Vision woke everyone up. Morgan wasn’t grumpy anymore, thank goodness for Tony.

They arrived at the park soon after. Tony had to explain to security about Nebula after she went through the metal detector. They were all allowed to go in.

Tony divided everyone into pairs. Harley and Peter, Nebula and Vision, and him and Morgan.

“Remember to check in at the Mad Tea Party at 1:00, and meet at the entrance at 6:00 to leave.” Tony reminded them.

They understood and took off.

“And stay safe!!” Tony yelled.

-

Hello there, and thank you for reading. My next chapter will probably be telling what Peter and Harley did. I’m not the best writer so I hope I did good! Don’t know when the next chapter will come out. Maybe tomorrow? I don’t know. Anyways, thank you 3000 for reading!

Finally after about five minutes of bugging him, Vision unbuckled, got his phone and gave it to Peter. Meanwhile Tony took a wrong turn and was yelling at Vision, who blamed Peter. Harley got the webbing off with one of Nebula’s knives he found on the floor and was yelling at Peter. Morgan woke up and was grumpy, while Nebula still heard nothing.

About an hour later they arrived at the airport. Rhodey would come later and pick up Tony’s car.

After a long wait they boarded their plane. Harley was a little scared, so Tony sat beside him. Vision sat behind Tony with Morgan, and Peter and Nebula were infront of Tony and Harley.

The flight was much better than the car. Everyone fell asleep, except for Vision.

When the plane landed, Vision woke everyone up. Morgan wasn’t grumpy anymore, thank goodness for Tony.

They arrived at the park soon after. Tony had to explain to security about Nebula after she went through the metal detector. They were all allowed to go in.

Tony divided everyone into pairs. Harley and Peter, Nebula and Vision, and him and Morgan.

“Remember to check in at the Mad Tea Party at 1:00, and meet at the entrance at 6:00 to leave.” Tony reminded them.

They understood and took off.

“And stay safe!!” Tony yelled.

The Iron-Family at Disneyland: Getting Ready and On their Way

Peter had been relentless. He had always wanted to go to Disney, and so did Harley, Nebula and Vision. Tony and Pepper had taken Morgan there once, but she was too little to remember it.

“Ok, does everyone have their bags?” Tony said.

They all shook their heads yes. Peter had a Spiderman backpack he saw at Target, Harley had a red and black bag, Nebula had a silky blue bag, Vision had a normal backpack, and Tony held Morgans Iron Man backpack with a Hello Kitty key chain.

“Ok. Does everyone have sunscreen, money for food and stuff, and their phones, because we are not turning around.” Tony asked.

They all checked and said yes.

“Ok, let’s load up!” Tony motioned his hand towards the door. Peter and Harley took off running, while Nebula and Vision just walked. Tony said bye to Pepper and gave her a kiss, and Morgan hugged her. Morgan then went to run with Peter and Harley but Tony picked her up and carried her piggy-back style.

They all arrived at the car. Vision was in the front with Tony and helped navigate, Nebula and Morgan were in the next row, and Peter and Harley sat in the back.

The car was a war zone.

Peter dropped his phone and it slid up and infront of Nebula. Nebula had air pods from Tony on, and couldn’t hear Peter, and Morgan fell asleep.

“Oh no. She can’t hear us. She has air pods!” Harley joked, witch did not amuse Peter.

body:
Numb

Warnings: HEAVY GORE, HEAVY BLOOD, BIG NONO FOR PTSD, Mental Health Shit, Drugging.

Tags: @yoinkszoinks @yoinks-i-dont-feel-so-good @hey-im-pan @harleykeenerprotectionsquad @pitterparkour @bumbblebeeeeee @saturnwhomst

Chapter Two; Stop.

Peter landed on the sidewalk at the compound. He winced at his landing due to the scar on his back. Peter had a shard of glass in his knee from front flipping out of the expensive pane. He webbed across the scenery for what seemed like ages till he was in a alley somewhere close to the city.

He slid down the bricks at his back, with his senses screaming. He ignored them.

God, he wished he didn’t.

He felt a needle enter his neck, delving deep into his skin, paralyzing him.

“Jeez, Parker. Is the spider sense not working, Bitch? Trust me, I’ve studied you, I know who you are, we have a plan for you and you just ran right into the trap.” Peter tried to move, but he couldn’t there was blood trickling down his neck as he was slipping away from consciousness.

“Fuck you.”

“PETER!” Tony cried out of the broken pane, trying not to step on the sharp edges of the debris from the glass. “I’m getting the team.” Steve said bluntly, exiting the room. Tony grabbed the super soldier’s shoulder. “No, he’s my kid.” He stared into his eyes with rage at Steve’s previous comment. “My kid, my rescue.” He tapped the Arc Reactor and suited up. “Tony-“ Steve ran towards the man about to fly out of the same hole Peter made in the window. “I’m Motherfucking sure bitch.” He snapped at Steve, jumping out following Peter’s past actions.

After about 20 miles of flight it started to rain, he ducked into the alley he was closest to out of reflex, he knew his suit would work in the rain but he ducked into the alley anyways. A person in a set of jeans and a science pun shirt was sat further down in the alley. “Pete?” Tony ran towards the person. “Oh my god Peter!” He got on one knee next to the teen. “Peter?”

The genius grabbed the jaw of the teen, he was horrified at the pail tone on Peter’s face. He felt the blood from the teen’s neck, trying to check for a pulse.

He couldn’t feel one.

“Peter. I swear to god. If you’re dead-“ A person walked behind the billionaire and grabbed him. He grabbed a new ingection and shoved it into Tony’s neck. The man then covered Tony’s face and blocked all sources of air, causing him to pass out. The man saw the corpse and smiled. “Just like I planned it.”

Peter’s eyes fluttered open to being tied and handcuffed to a chair in a dark room with stone walls and a mirror that stretched across the wall. He looked at men standing before him with electrical paddles. They left the room to a confused Peter with trickling down his face. He panicked, trying to recall the last moments he experienced. The thing that upset him the most was the only thing he recalled was he had told the man to fuck off.

Tony woke to his hands chained above him but still tied to a chair. A dark room with 3 stone walls and a glass pane he could see out of. Was that Peter? “Pete?” Tony asked softly remembering the stilled pulse, but somehow Peter was alive and sobbing. Then he heard Peter’s voice cry out. “I’m sorry.” Peter hung his head. “I’m sorry, please, just tell me what I did.” He continued to sob quietly. As Tony shook his head sadly. “It’s not your fucking fault Peter.” As if it was on cue, the door flew open and a man walked through with a smirk. “Worried about what you did, bitch? Don’t be for long. It’s gonna be me you’re worried about.” He grabbed a knife out of his pocket. “Now, where to start? How about, riiiiiight here.” He drew out his words, cutting Pet cheek. Tony looked down wanting to say something but they couldn’t hear him, instead, the man looked him straight in the eyes, and smiled. Peter continued to cry, having the tears flow into his blood. His cheek was sliced open and gushing. “Not so much of a pretty face now, huh?” Peter winced as the man dug deeper into his cheek. The blood now was flowing into Peter’s mouth as he screamed. The chill Tony got from this scream was terrifying. “GET YOUR HANDS OFF PETER!” Tony screamed. But Peter couldn’t hear him, the mirror blocked noise.

He didn’t want to feel more pain, he didn’t want to feel it.

But he didn’t feel anything but pain. He didn’t realize the man had stopped, and that there was blood on the floor, his blood, he only realized the man had cut in his cheek, but there were two wounds, adding a gushing shoulder as well.

After the man stopped both of the people in captivity calmed down and found a way to make it comfortable enough for them to sleep.

When Peter started to scream, he woke Tony. He saw what was happening, he was being cut again. But this time It was across his stomach. “Kid!” Tony cried out, not able to do anything. But the man cutting knew somehow that he was crying out, and spoke. “Want me to stop, Stark?” This confused Peter, was Tony here too? Peter screamed louder at the feeling of the man cutting deeper. Tony looked up and tried to cover his ears with his arms, but it didn’t work when Peter got another cut underneath the one already recently put on his stomach by the blade making him scream louder than before. Tony had to look at the floor it was all he could do without looking at Peter, but all he saw was Peter’s blood everywhere. The man left Peter alone after being satisfied with his work. “Mr. Stark? Unless he.. lied to me, you’re here. I don’t know if you can hear me, or even see me. I just wanna say… I’m bleeding a lot, and I don’t know how much more blood I can lose.” Peter got choked up, “please don’t let me die..” Tony was startled at the fact he would say that. Especially because he was always positive about horrid situations. He continued to cry till he dozed off, leaving Tony the only one awake. He decided to follow Peter to sleep, since, it was the only thing to do.

The next time Peter woke up he was faced to a man he recognized. “Mr. Stark?” This woke Tony. He looked straight up. “Kid?” There was no blood on the floor anymore, so the two both assumed they were somewhere different. “Where are we?” Peter asked. “No clue. But I know one thing. YOU JUMPED OUT A WINDOW! WHAT THE ACTUAL HELL?!” Peter laughed at Tony freaking out, but that hurt the cuts on his stomach. Suddenly Peter remembered why. The pain flew back to him and he choked on it. Tony saw the face that Peter had made and instantly realized what he had asked had been a touchy question. “Adrenaline… I-it got the best out of me. I’m s-sorry.” “Oh.” The room went silent for a bit, With both of the boys deep in thought. Until the man came in again, Peter quaked at the knife now at his neck. “What’s wrong, little bitch, Scared?” His mouth was now covered by the man’s hand, blocking him from panicking. “What do I have to give you to stop?!” The man snickered. “I don’t think you understand, Stark. What I want is him. Dead.” Tony gulped at the idea of someone wanting a fifteen-year-old dead. ”What the hell did he do to you?! He’s innocent!” He screamed at the man. The figure did nothing, he just smiled. He pulled the knife across the teen’s skin. ”I won’t kill him yet, but I will.” Peter could still breathe, the man didn’t cut that deep. ”Actually, I’m not done yet.” He said to the tied-up men. He looked down the teen’s back and lifted him up. ”Perfect.” He cut right beside the scab and decided to open the previous cut on Peter’s back. Peter yelped under his covered mouth. Tony couldn’t help but look at the ground that was clean, now covered with Peter’s blood. Peter somehow broke free from the man’s grip.

”Stop. Just kill me already.”

Until the man came in again, Peter quaked at the knife now at his neck. “What’s wrong, little bitch, Scared?” His mouth was now covered by the man’s hand, blocking him from panicking. “What do I have to give you to stop?!” The man snickered. “I don’t think you understand, Stark. What I want is him. Dead.” Tony gulped at the idea of someone wanting a fifteen-year-old dead. ”What the hell did he do to you?! He’s innocent!” He screamed at the man. The figure did nothing, he just smiled. He pulled the knife across the teen’s skin. ”I won’t kill him yet, but I will.” Peter could still breathe, the man didn’t cut that deep. ”Actually, I’m not done yet.” He said to the tied-up men. He looked down the teen’s back and lifted him up. ”Perfect.” He cut right beside the scab and decided to open the previous cut on Peter’s back. Peter yelped under his covered mouth. Tony couldn’t help but look at the ground that was clean, now covered with Peter’s blood. Peter somehow broke free from the man’s grip.

”Stop. Just kill me already.”

Chapter Two; Stop.

Peter landed on the sidewalk at the compound. He winced at his landing due to the scar on his back. Peter had a shard of glass in his knee from front flipping out of the expensive pane. He webbed across the scenery for what seemed like ages till he was in a alley somewhere close to the city.

He slid down the bricks at his back, with his senses screaming. He ignored them.

God, he wished he didn’t.

He felt a needle enter his neck, delving deep into his skin, paralyzing him.

“Jeez, Parker. Is the spider sense not working, Bitch? Trust me, I’ve studied you, I know who you are, we have a plan for you and you just ran right into the trap.” Peter tried to move, but he couldn’t there was blood trickling down his neck as he was slipping away from consciousness.

“Fuck you.”

“PETER!” Tony cried out of the broken pane, trying not to step on the sharp edges of the debris from the glass. “I’m getting the team.” Steve said bluntly, exiting the room. Tony grabbed the super soldier’s shoulder. “No, he’s my kid.” He stared into his eyes with rage at Steve’s previous comment. “My kid, my rescue.” He tapped the Arc Reactor and suited up. “Tony-“ Steve ran towards the man about to fly out of the same hole Peter made in the window. “I’m Motherfucking sure bitch.” He snapped at Steve, jumping out following Peter’s past actions.

After about 20 miles of flight it started to rain, he ducked into the alley he was closest to out of reflex, he knew his suit would work in the rain but he ducked into the alley anyways. A person in a set of jeans and a science pun shirt was sat further down in the alley. “Pete?” Tony ran towards the person. “Oh my god Peter!” He got on one knee next to the teen. “Peter?”

The genius grabbed the jaw of the teen, he was horrified at the pail tone on Peter’s face. He felt the blood from the teen’s neck, trying to check for a pulse.

He couldn’t feel one.

“Peter. I swear to god. If you’re dead-“ A person walked behind the billionaire and grabbed him. He grabbed a new ingection and shoved it into Tony’s neck. The man then covered Tony’s face and blocked all sources of air, causing him to pass out. The man saw the corpse and smiled. “Just like I planned it.”

Peter’s eyes fluttered open to being tied and handcuffed to a chair in a dark room with stone walls and a mirror that stretched across the wall. He looked at men standing before him with electrical paddles. They left the room to a confused Peter with trickling down his face. He panicked, trying to recall the last moments he experienced. The thing that upset him the most was the only thing he recalled was he had told the man to fuck off.

Tony woke to his hands chained above him but still tied to a chair. A dark room with 3 stone walls and a glass pane he could see out of. Was that Peter? “Pete?” Tony asked softly remembering the stilled pulse, but somehow Peter was alive and sobbing. Then he heard Peter’s voice cry out. “I’m sorry.” Peter hung his head. “I’m sorry, please, just tell me what I did.” He continued to sob quietly. As Tony shook his head sadly. “It’s not your fucking fault Peter.” As if it was on cue, the door flew open and a man walked through with a smirk. “Worried about what you did, bitch? Don’t be for long. It’s gonna be me you’re worried about.” He grabbed a knife out of his pocket. “Now, where to start? How about, riiiiiight here.” He drew out his words, cutting Pet cheek. Tony looked down wanting to say something but they couldn’t hear him, instead, the man looked him straight in the eyes, and smiled. Peter continued to cry, having the tears flow into his blood. His cheek was sliced open and gushing. “Not so much of a pretty face now, huh?” Peter winced as the man dug deeper into his cheek. The blood now was flowing into Peter’s mouth as he screamed. The chill Tony got from this scream was terrifying. “GET YOUR HANDS OFF PETER!” Tony screamed. But Peter couldn’t hear him, the mirror blocked noise.

He didn’t want to feel more pain, he didn’t want to feel it.

But he didn’t feel anything but pain. He didn’t realize the man had stopped, and that there was blood on the floor, his blood, he only realized the man had cut in his cheek, but there were two wounds, adding a gushing shoulder as well.

After the man stopped both of the people in captivity calmed down and found a way to make it comfortable enough for them to sleep.

When Peter started to scream, he woke Tony. He saw what was happening, he was being cut again. But this time It was across his stomach. “Kid!” Tony cried out, not able to do anything. But the man cutting knew somehow that he was crying out, and spoke. “Want me to stop, Stark?” This confused Peter, was Tony here too? Peter screamed louder at the feeling of the man cutting deeper. Tony looked up and tried to cover his ears with his arms, but it didn’t work when Peter got another cut underneath the one already recently put on his stomach by the blade making him scream louder than before. Tony had to look at the floor it was all he could do without looking at Peter, but all he saw was Peter’s blood everywhere. The man left Peter alone after being satisfied with his work. “Mr. Stark? Unless he.. lied to me, you’re here. I don’t know if you can hear me, or even see me. I just wanna say… I’m bleeding a lot, and I don’t know how much more blood I can lose.” Peter got choked up, “please don’t let me die..” Tony was startled at the fact he would say that. Especially because he was always positive about horrid situations. He continued to cry till he dozed off, leaving Tony the only one awake. He decided to follow Peter to sleep, since, it was the only thing to do.

The next time Peter woke up he was faced to a man he recognized. “Mr. Stark?” This woke Tony. He looked straight up. “Kid?” There was no blood on the floor anymore, so the two both assumed they were somewhere different. “Where are we?” Peter asked. “No clue. But I know one thing. YOU JUMPED OUT A WINDOW! WHAT THE ACTUAL HELL?!” Peter laughed at Tony freaking out, but that hurt the cuts on his stomach. Suddenly Peter remembered why. The pain flew back to him and he choked on it. Tony saw the face that Peter had made and instantly realized what he had asked had been a touchy question. “Adrenaline… I-it got the best out of me. I’m s-sorry.” “Oh.” The room went silent for a bit, With both of the boys deep in thought. Until the man came in again, Peter quaked at the knife now at his neck. “What’s wrong, little bitch, Scared?” His mouth was now covered by the man’s hand, blocking him from panicking. “What do I have to give you to stop?!” The man snickered. “I don’t think you understand, Stark. What I want is him. Dead.” Tony gulped at the idea of someone wanting a fifteen-year-old dead. ”What the hell did he do to you?! He’s innocent!” He screamed at the man. The figure did nothing, he just smiled. He pulled the knife across the teen’s skin. ”I won’t kill him yet, but I will.” Peter could still breathe, the man didn’t cut that deep. ”Actually, I’m not done yet.” He said to the tied-up men. He looked down the teen’s back and lifted him up. ”Perfect.” He cut right beside the scab and decided to open the previous cut on Peter’s back. Peter yelped under his covered mouth. Tony couldn’t help but look at the ground that was clean, now covered with Peter’s blood. Peter somehow broke free from the man’s grip.

”Stop. Just kill me already.”

After Amy Pascal allegedly threw a sandwich in Feige’s face, I believe...
body:
Why Sony and Kevin Feige didn’t go with Miles Morales when they rebooted Spider-Man into the MCU

Yes, because it wasn’t just Feige making the decisions.

After Amy Pascal allegedly threw a sandwich in Feige’s face, I believe they sat down and talk about their plans for the future of Spider-Man. Surely they talked about Miles, but there are 3 simple reasons why they went with Peter instead of Miles.

  1. Sony being the ones with the rights to the character, were the one that had the last words and they decided on being a reboot of Peter Parker.
  2. Since Sony already had plans to make a movie with Miles, they couldn’t use that character in the MCU or it would have been too confusing for the general audience.
  3. Miles isn’t that well known to the general audience. I know what you’re going to say: “Yeah, but the Guardians of the Galaxy were not that well knows until they made a movie about them.” That might be true, but the Guardians are not a household name like Spider-Man is. Everyone and their mothers know that Spider-Man is Peter Parker. There’s a reason why in Spider-verse there were 5 different versions of Spider-Man including 2 Peter Parker (one apparently is an older version of Tom Holland’s Peter Parker since they confirmed that he is the 616 version) because Miles alone could have carried this movie all by himself.

Seriously if they went with Miles just to appease a certain demographic and give him Peter’s storyline in Civil War it would have been a disrespect to both characters. Yes they changed Ned and flash just to name a few. but it didn’t matter to the plot because the spirit of the characters compare to their comic counterparts remained intact. I. E. Flash being a bully to Peter and Peter and Ned’s friendship.

Maybe in the future, we will see Miles in the MCU. We already saw his uncle and in a deleted scene we see him saw talk to Miles on the phone, so one can only hope.
